subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Falcons re-signed quarterback Joey Harrington, one week after cutting him. General Manager Thomas Dimitroff, who also has re-signed Chris Redman to a two-year deal, has said the team will take a quarterback in next month’s draft.
snippet: The Atlanta Falcons re-signed quarterback Joey Harrington, one week after cutting him. General Manager Thomas Dimitroff, who also has re-signed Chris Redman to a two-year deal, has said the team will take a quarterback in next month’s draft.
